original_text: Then the king said to his other servants, “The meal for my son's marriage is ready. But the people that I had asked to come did not deserve to come.
korean_text: 이에 종들에게 이르되 혼인 잔치는 준비되었으나 청한 사람들은 합당하지 아니하니

sentences.original_text: Then the king said to his other servants
The meal for my son's marriage is ready
But the people that I had asked to come
